mapper.insert: insert into membertopup (addbalance, addcount, give, toptime, intro, member_id, product_id, discount,state) values (#{addbalance}, #{addcount}, #{give}, #{toptime}, #{intro}, #{member.id}, #{product_id}, #{discount},#{state})
mapper.update: update membertopup set addbalance = #{addbalance}, addcount = #{addcount}, give = #{give}, toptime = #{toptime}, intro = #{intro}, member_id = #{member.id}, product_id = #{product_id}, discount = #{discount} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, addbalance, addcount, give, toptime, intro, member_id, product_id, discount from membertopup
